title: Post 1
markdown: ##The Vardyger publishing platform :) Modelled using **Swagger 2.0** and the Swagger Editor, built using Express.js 4.0, Swagger Tools, Mongoose and MongoDB.
html:
The Vardyger publishing platform :)

Modelled using Swagger 2.0 and the Swagger Editor, built using Express.js 4.0, Swagger Tools, Mongoose and MongoDB.
